channel.title: Disconnecting problem
channel.description: When I click somewhere to walk to, it automatically disconnects me, but when I attempt to log in, it says that I'm already logged in. I then have to close the window and re-open it to log back in. Can anyone help?

item.title: Disconnecting problem
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

are you using 127.0.0.1? cause if you are then thats hybridscape, it usually does that, its not really good, go to server advertisment section for a list of servers.

Read full topic
